ValidationRule.description: SE-260 - Enforce so that on record save/update so that Non Standard Configuration is true then Non-Standard Configuration Details must not be blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF(
AND (NOT($Setup.HRCFSL_Org_Exception_Rule__c.HRCFSL_Validation_Rule__c),
OR( OR( AND(ISNEW(),HRCSVC_Non_Standard_Configuration__c = True, ISBLANK( HRCSVC_Non_Standard_Config_Details__c )) , AND(HRCSVC_Non_Standard_Configuration__c = True, ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Non_Standard_Config_Details__c ))),
AND(HRCSVC_Non_Standard_Configuration__c = False, NOT(ISBLANK( HRCSVC_Non_Standard_Config_Details__c ))) ) ),
true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the Non-Standard Configuration Checkbox/Details
